biography: Indian Retailer is India's largest news,research and market intelligence creator in the retail , e-commerce , brand licensing and D2C industry

latestIgtvVideos.caption:
Ed-a-Mamma, the conscious kids' clothing #D2C brand, has expanded its business by launching its #kidswear collection in the Indian market via shop-in-shops. The brand has stepped into the retail market in major #metropolitan cities as well as Tier II cities through #Shoppers Stop and #Lifestyle stores. 

LINK IN BIO.

#Retail chain Shoppers Stop Ltd reported a consolidated net #profit of Rs 22.83 crore for the first quarter that ended on June 30, 2022. The company had posted a net loss of Rs 104.89 crore in the April-June quarter a year ago, said Shoppers Stop in a regulatory filing.

LINK IN BIO.

The Spice Tailor, an award-winning Indian #spice company created a decade ago by a British Indian couple, is to be acquired by UK manufacturer Premier Foods for an initial consideration of GBP 43.8 million. 

Premier #Foods, which owns several iconic food brands including producing Cadbury cakes under license, said the acquisition of the company known for its premium and #authentic Indian meal kits is aligned with the company's #growth strategy.

LINK IN BIO.

Areport published in 2019 indicated that 51 percent of #restaurant operators said staffing is a top challenge, with another 35 percent admitting that training staff can be challenging. Devoting sufficient resources to devise an effective #training method for restaurant staff is important yet many fail to address this concern. While hiring and staff crunch have always been the centre of the debate, training essentials have somehow taken the back seat.

LINK IN BIO.

After years of no #travel, eating in, and saving money while borders remained closed, many people are ready to ‘#revenge spend’. It’s no secret that today’s #consumers have increased their #online spending and with a surge in online transactions across the Asia Pacific since the start of the #pandemic – but they also expect more when it comes to their #digital experiences. 

LINK IN BIO.

If the #pandemic has brought one thing on top of everyone’s list, it has to be hygiene. Whether the goal is to stay physically or mentally #healthy, hygiene has to be a factor that needs to be considered. 

However, how often do we talk or discuss hygiene Below the Belt? In fact, for a massive #Indian population, #hygiene Below the Belt is a non-classified taboo subject.

LINK IN BIO.

Leading #FMCG company Emami announced acquiring a 30 percent #stake in a pet-care #startup Cannis Lupus Services India for an undisclosed amount. Cannis Lupus Services India offers #Ayurvedic remedies for pets under the brand 'Fur Ball Story'. It uses a wide range of plants and herbs to formulate its #medicines, said a joint statement.

LINK IN BIO,

@fabindiaofficial is an established legacy focussing on #authentic, #sustainable, and Indian lifestyle products. The consumer #lifestyle brand has well-recognized marquee brands - ‘Fabindia’ and ‘Organic India.’ Both the brands operate on the core principles of 'Celebrating India' and '#Healthy Conscious Living'.

LINK IN BIO

Hyderabad-based #streetwear apparel, Freiq has unveiled #trendy streetwear collections at a pop-up exhibition in Banjara Hills. The expo saw renowned #fashion connoisseurs checking out the latest #apparel range launched by the brand which was on display at the show.

LINK IN BIO.

Categories such as sports goods, jewelry, and #consumer #electronics reported stronger growth in June compared to 2019 levels, as per the 29th edition of the #Retail Business Survey. Retailers of sports goods reported a 29 percent growth in #business, while jewelers reported a strong 27 percent sales #growth in the same period.

LINK IN BIO.

Chennai-based CHOSEN® has #launched six mineral-based sunscreens under the banner of #SAFESCREEN™ recently meant to suit Indian #skin types. The sunscreens have 80-90 percent natural ingredients and the entire range is currently available in the #onlinestores and at the flagship CHOSEN Store located in Chennai.

LINK IN BIO.

It would be an understatement to say that #Indian #consumers have not changed significantly over the years. Today’s average #consumers are empowered, aware, and #tech-savvy. Gone are the days when a high-octane mass media #advertisement will sway #customer opinion. These days there are a #multitude of options and platforms available such as web, social, mobile, #e-commerce, print media, pop-up stores, malls, and high streets to research and learn about products, make purchases, share feedback, etc.

LINK IN BIO

latestPosts.caption:
#CoverAlert

Hot off the Press! This month on Retailer, it’s all about tech that sells — starting with our cover story on Shoppers Stop and the dynamic CEO Kavindra Mishra, who’s turning stores into experience hubs with smart trial rooms, private labels, and a digital-first mindset.

Also inside:
•	4 easy tech upgrades for your store
•	How digital tools are lifting sales by 30%
•	Why Bharat—not metros—is driving the next wave of retail
•	The D2C brands scaling smart, without starting physical

Tech doesn’t have to shout. But when done right, it changes everything.

#RetailIndia #ShoppersStop #RetailTech #D2C #RetailTransformation #BharatRetail #RetailerMagazine

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | The Fern Hotels & Resorts has announced the signing of a new property in Jaipur, marking the group’s fifth hotel in the city and further solidifying its presence in Rajasthan. With this addition, the brand’s portfolio in the state rises to 17 properties, either operational or set to open soon.

#retail #hospitality #business #news #market #update #hotel #expansion #newproperty
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Indian Retailer on July 17, 2025. May be an image of 1 person, poster, plant and text that says 'R Fern Hotels Strengthens Rajasthan Presence with New Jaipur Project In addition to accommodation, the property will also offer food and beverage age outlets, banquet and meeting facilities, and other guest amenities tailored to modern travel needs.'.

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | CG Foods Global, the company behind the fast-growing Wai Wai noodle brand, has emerged as a significant player in India’s competitive instant noodle market. With a strong manufacturing and distribution network, deep-rooted regional strategies, and a clear digital push, the company is poised to reach its ambitious Rs 1,200 crore revenue target by FY25–26.

BY - Vaishnavi Gupta (@vaishnavi.guptamehndiratta), Assistant Editor, IndianRetailer.com & Retailer Media

#retail #business #market #news #update #expansion #growth #food #WaiWai #noodle

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | Fashion quick commerce startup Zulu Club has raised $250,000 in pre-seed funding from early-stage venture capital firm TDV Partners. Based in Gurgaon, the startup is rethinking the online fashion shopping experience by combining the convenience of digital ordering with the tactile confidence of trying clothes at home — all within minutes.

#D2C #business #news #market #update #funding #fashion #brand #expansion

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | D2C fine jewellery brand GIVA has introduced ‘GIVA Go,’ a new one-day delivery service that is now available across four major cities: Mumbai, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, and Delhi. With the launch of GIVA Go, customers will now be able to receive their jewellery orders within just 24 hours of placing them.

#D2C #business #news #market #update #fine #jewellery #brand #growth #expansion

#D2CPlaybook

In a candid conversation with Nandini Banerjee @neophilenaddy) , Managing Editor, Retailer Media; @amarnagaram, Co-Founder & CEO, @virgio.official discusses how Virgio is redefining fashion retail with tech, speed, and zero inventory waste .

#retail #business #market #d2cplaybook #virgio #fashion 
#clothing #brand #technology

When it comes to travel gear, most people have long accepted a trade-off: you can either have something stylish, sustainable, or built to last, but rarely all three. uppercase, a digital-first Indian luggage brand, was founded to change that equation. Established by Sudip Ghose and Arnob Mondal, with Uday Sodhi, Dheeraj Goyal, and Nidhi Rajora as key founding team members in 2022, Uppercase set out with a clear vision: to redefine how we see luggage, not just as a utility, but as an extension of personal style and values.

BY - RIA DUNEJA (@riaduneja), IndianRetailer.com, Retailer Media

#D2C #business #news #market #update #uppercase #luggage #brand #growth
latestPosts.alt: Photo shared by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025 tagging @uppercase_ecobags. May be an image of 2 people, suitcase, briefcase, luggage and text that says 'R 스 uppercase 감이 Rs 511 Cr Valuation, 5X Growth: Why Uppercase is India's Fastest-Rising Luggage Brand'.

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | Luxury fashion platform, Culture Circle, has secured strategic funding from Ritesh Agarwal, Founder & CEO of OYO, at a valuation of over Rs. 100 crore. This investment comes shortly after the brand’s notable appearance on Shark Tank India, where it secured a Rs. 3 crore deal with Ritesh Agarwal and Kunal Bahl, choosing their offer over a record-breaking Rs. 8 crore bid to focus on building long-term value. The startup, which has already seen its business grow fourfold, now stands at a valuation of over Rs. 400 crore.

#D2C #business #news #market #update #funding #fashion #lifestyle #luxury #brand #expansion #growth
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025. May be an image of 2 people, people standing, poster and text that says 'CULTURE CIRCLE R Culture Circle Raises Strategic Funding from Ritesh Agarwal at Rs 400 Cr Valuation'.

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | Swiggy Ltd has launched a dedicated ‘High Protein’ category on its food delivery marketplace, targeting the growing demand for health-focused dining options in India. This new feature is currently live across 30 cities including major metros like Bengaluru, Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai, and Pune, as well as emerging cities such as Nagpur, Jaipur, and Chandigarh. The category includes over five lakh dishes sourced from more than 35,000 restaurant partners.

#retail #business #news #market #update #swiggy #launch #highprotein #food
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025. May be an image of 2 people and text that says 'R SWIGE FOOD FOOD DELIVERY APP 35,000 Restaurants Join Swiggy's S High Protein Initiative for Health-Conscious Health- Diners Swiggy plans to continue collaborating with restaurant partners to expand the availability of high protein items and strengthen its position in the growing segment of nutrition- forward food delivery.'.

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | Flipkart’s quick commerce arm, Flipkart Minutes, recorded a notable increase in demand for monsoon-related essentials during June, highlighting a shift in consumer behaviour toward rapid delivery platforms for seasonal needs. The platform currently lists over 1,000 monsoon-specific products, with 90 percent of them, including umbrellas, raincoats, mop sets, insect killers, power banks, and torches, being sold in the past month.

#retail #business #news #market #update #flipkart #quickcommerce #flipkartminutes #growth #monsoonproduct
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025. May be an image of signboard and text that says 'R Fupkart Flipkart Minutes Logs 90 Pc Spike in Monsoon Product Sales During June Demand for rain gear, particularly umbrellas and aincoats, g grew up to five times, while cleaning esse essentials like mop sets witnessed a 2.5 times increase.'.

latestPosts.caption:
#linkinbio | PhonePe’s quick commerce platform, Pincode, has enabled more than 1,000 local offline stores across major Indian cities, Bengaluru, Pune, Delhi NCR, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Varanasi, to transition into the digital economy. The platform aims to enhance the competitiveness of traditional retailers by combining technology, operational expertise, and logistics capabilities.

#retail #business #news #market #update #PhonePe #businessstrategies #pincode
latestPosts.alt: Photo shared by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025 tagging @pincode_shopping. May be an image of 2 people, screen, phone, magazine and text that says 'R pincod! medicin Gocerles moren ccomeloin20mia 10m Pincode by PhonePe Digitally Enables 1,000+ Offline Stores Across Indian Cities Pincode is helping traditional retail businesses adapt to India's evolving digital commerce landscape through access to digital storefronts, inventory tools, and dependable delivery systems.'.

latestPosts.caption:
Wipro Consumer Care and Lighting, one of India’s foremost fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) companies, is set to enter a new chapter of leadership with the appointment of Kumar Chander as its new Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director, effective February 1, 2026. This transition follows the retirement of Vineet Agrawal, who has served the company for four decades and led it through its impressive transformation from a domestic business to a global powerhouse.

BY - Vaishnavi Gupta (@vaishnavi.guptamehndiratta), Assistant Editor, IndianRetailer.com & Retailer Media

#retail #business #news #market #update #wipro #appointment #FMCG
latestPosts.alt: Photo shared by Indian Retailer on July 16, 2025 tagging @wiprolimited.
